document.masterDocTitle: Oribatid mites (Acari: Oribatida) recorded from Ireland: Catalogue, historical records, species habitats and geographical distribution, combinations, variations and synonyms

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Oribatid mites (Acari: Oribatida) recorded from Ireland: Catalogue, historical records, species habitats and geographical distribution, combinations, variations and synonyms

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Oribatula tibialis (Nicolet, 1855)
*

· Original name:
Notaspis tibialis Nicolet, 1855
.
· In: Histoire naturelle des Acariens qui se trouvent aux environs de Paris. Archives du Muséum d’Histoire Naturelle, Paris, 7, 381–482.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Oribatula ( Oribatula ) tibialis (Nicolet) Subías, 2004
.
Counties: Cork , Donegal , Dublin , Galway , Kerry , Kildare , Kilkenny , Laois , Limerick , Mayo , Offaly , Roscommon and Sligo .

·
Zygoribatula connexa Berlese, 1904

· Original name:
Oribatula connexa Berlese, 1904
.

· In:
Redia
, 1, 273.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Oribatula ( Zygoribatula ) connexa (Berlese) Subías, 2004
.
Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Grassland beside apple orchard (Arroyo et al. 2014; unpublished data). Counties: Dublin .

·
Zygoribatula exilis (Nicolet, 1855)
*

· Original name:
Nostaspis exilis Nicolet, 1855
.
· In: Histoire naturelle des Acariens qui se trouvent aux environs de Paris. Archives du Muséum d’Histoire Naturelle, Paris, 7, 381–482.

· Synonyms:
Dameosoma jugorum Hull, 1914
;
Oribatula ( Zygoribatula ) lineola Berlese, 1916
;
Zygoribatula zicsii Bayoumi, 1979
.

Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Moss (Halbert 1907, 1915); dune at seashore (Purvis 1982), fungal sporocarps (O’Connell 1994); moss in canopy in Sitka spruce forest (Arroyo et al . 2009c); Machair fixed (stable) dunes, Machair fore dunes and Machair grassland (Arroyo and Bolger 2011); moss in canopy, moss on soil and soil in oak, ash, Scots pine and Sitka spruce forests and canopy in ash and oak forests (Arroyo et al. 2012, 2013b); moss in canopy and moss on trunk in yew and oak forest and moss on soil in oak forest (Arroyo et al . 2013c); canopy in ash, oak and Sitka spruce forests (unpublished data). Counties: Clare , Cork , Donegal , Dublin , Galway , Kerry , Kildare , Kilkenny , Laois , Mayo , Offaly , Roscommon , Sligo , Tipperary , Wexford and Wicklow .

·
Phauloppia lucorum (C.L. Koch, 1841)

· Original name:
Zetes lucorum C.L. Koch, 1841
.
· In: Deutschlands Crustaceen, Myriapoden und Arachniden, 31(18).

· Historical combinations/variations:
Lucoppia lucorum (C.L. Koch) Jeleva, 1966
;
Nostaspis lucorum (C.L. Koch) Michael, 1888
.
Counties: Armagh , Clare , Donegal , Dublin , Galway , Kerry , Kildare , Kilkenny , Laois , Mayo , Roscommon , Sligo , Tipperary and Wicklow .

·
Phauloppia rauschenensis (Sellnick, 1908)
*

· Original name:
Eremaeus rauschenensis Sellnick, 1908
.

· In: Formenkreis Hornmilben, Oribatei. In: P. Brohmer, Die Tierwelt Mitteleuropas , 3(9), 1–42. · Historical combinations/variations:
Eporibatula rauschenensis (Sellnick) Sellnick, 1928
. · Synonyms:
Oribatula lucida Sellnick, 1921
;
Eporibatula gessneri Willmann, 1932
;
Phauloppia saxicola

paragraph.materialsCitation: Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Nests of Kittiwake ( Turk and Turk 1952); canopy and soil moss in Scots

subSubSection.paragraph: pine forests (Arroyo et al. 2012, 2013b).
